item.title: If you survived somehow, keep some part of my soul inside your own
item.author: hi@mtita.me (Mohamed Tita)
item.description: I don't believe in the existence of a soul, at least not by the religious definition of it. I've always been occupied with this thought … what is a soul? â€¦ is it enough to say that it's the very definition of knowledge and experience ? … can we assume that we are all born equal … identical white papers waiting to be filled with misery and suffering.
